author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Florence /Lauderdale Tourism to host Fishing World Finals Championship for next 3 yrTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Florence /Lauderdale Tourism to host Fishing World Finals Championship for next 3 yr
An agreement has been signed between the Bass Federation and the Florence /Lauderdale Tourism Board. According to the agreement Florence will be home to The Bass Federation’s High School Fishing World Finals Championship for the next three years.
Florence hosted the 2015 Championship which brought in $1.5 million dollars to the Shoals area. Excited with the huge revenue generated, Florence has decided to host the championship in 2016, 2017, and 2018.
According to Florence/Lauderdale Tourism the 2015 championship brought in people from 22 states and 166 boats.
“This is the largest economic impact of any tournament ever held here. The three-year commitment will allow multi-year advertising and potential to increase the tournament size dramatically,” said Assistant Director of Florence/Lauderdale Tourism, Alison Stanfield.
